text: 14 Days to Life () is a 1997 German thriller film directed by Roland Suso Richter. == Cast == * Kai Wiesinger - von Seidlitz * Michael Mendl - Viktor Czernetzky * Katharina Meinecke - Annika * Axel Pape - Häring * - Cornelia * Jürgen Schornagel - Kaschinski * Axel Milberg - Kleinschmidt * - Ramon * Detlef Bothe - Rudi * - Schröder * - Kaiser * - Kruse * Peter Fitz - Direktor * - Justizminister Friedemann Volkerts == References == == External links == * Category:1997 films Category:1990s thriller films Category:German films Category:1990s prison films Category:German prison films
title: 14 Days to Life
